summary: My personal color scheme.  Download the archive for all the screenshots (it\'s worth your time :)  High contrast, vivid colors, low but noticeable bloom lighting.  Intense particles, all details greatly sharpened and enhanced.  I\'ve tried every other setting out there, and in the end, this is the one I settled on.  From me to you, good hunting, Do
descriptionHtml:
My personal color scheme.  High contrast, bright colors, low but noticeable bloom lighting.  Intense particles, all details greatly sharpened and enhanced.  Bright days, mild nights, vivid dungeons.  Everything is more intense and detailed.  I\'ve tried every other setting out there, and in the end, this is the one I settled on.  From me to you, good hunting, Dovakiin.  Nexus didn\'t let me upload my screen shots for some reason -- download the before and after archive to see screenshots.

This packet includes:

1. A .txt file with all the settings for the FXAA tool.
2. a .rar file with all the before and after shots

download the FXAA installer tool by some_dude HERE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131&navtag=file/images.php?id=131&tab=3

Installation:

Run the FXAA installer.  Open the FXAA tool.  Set the sliders to the values specified in the .txt file.  Enjoy.

Uninstallation:

Run the FXAA/ENB remover tool by volvaga0, found HERE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7804

Thanks to some_dude for the FXAA tool.
Thanks to volvaga0 for the fxaa/enb remover tool -- works perfectly.
I highly recommend Mygoodeye and Gophers Dynavision Dynamic Depth of Field with this setting.  It creates some remarkable visuals.  Enjoy!!

Upload images if you like this setting.  We all deserve a pretty Skyrim!!
author: guaniassist
